gridAutomaton

Class SquareGrid

  • java.lang.Object
    • gridAutomaton.SquareGrid
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Grid, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class SquareGrid
extends java.lang.Object
implements Grid, java.lang.Cloneable
    This grid is squared and toric. Basically, any cell has exactly eight neighbors given by the eight directions.
    Author:
    rhynes
